Once I download this app, I got a virus. I am not aware of how, but once I immediately opened the app, I obtained a virus on my phone. It is highly unacceptable and I will not stand for it.

attributes.review: this app hacked my bank account which i was saving for my pet pig who has recently passed. after hacking my account a wizard was sent to my address and turned me into a cheto. i then fell to the floor and was later carried away by ants to their hideaway. i was at their hideaway, a sad little cheto i was pleading for mercy. as i screamed i saw a very tall man with another man who was very short. the tall man then looked at me. i realized it was no other that harry tomlinson and louis styles. harry picked me up and said that he would help me. on the walk home harry was paying more attention to me than louis. louis then got jealous grabbed me from harryâ€™s hands and yelled iâ€™m your husband pay attention to me. he then proceeded to throw me on the ground and stomp on me. there i was a crushed cheto both my soul and body smashed to pieces. a chocked sob escaped my mouth as all the dust from my body floated away in the wind. all of me gone in the wind. free at last i was. - yours truly the cheto gone to soon
